name: chatapp-redux
description: Fullstack PWA built with React Redux and Socket.io.

scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-client: cd frontend && npm install --omit-dev --workspace=@chatapp-redux/frontend && npm i -g serve --workspace=@chatapp-redux/frontend && npm run build --workspace=@chatapp-redux/frontend
scripts.postinstall-server: cd backend && npm install --omit-dev --workspace=@chatapp-redux/backend && npm run build --workspace=@chatapp-redux/backend
